PluginData.Author: dude
PluginData.Tooltip: Swap between armor types with ease.
PluginData.Description:
Type '/replacearmor' while looking at or controlling a ship to open the selection UI. Select the type of armor you want to convert to, and click ok, this will save a new blueprint of the ship converted into the selected type of armor.
Works in creative and survival, with small grids and large grids, and should detect modded armor types of the vanilla shapes.
